We take today to honor the brave men and women who have selflessly risked their lives to fight for our country. Thank you for your service.

20 years ago today, we all watched in horror as our country was viciously attacked.

We are forever indebted to those first responders and brave servicemembers who answered the call in its aftermath. 

May we never forget the lives lost that tragic day
